text: @mkatju @mkatju  god send people to battle #COVID2019 like as Doctor, Nurses, police, sweepers and many hidden who are working more than 18hrs to save people. But due to #Jamatipeople Covid-19 spreading among us. Respect to god. @narendramodi @PMOIndia @RohitSardana0 @chitraaum
